Row.Text: [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Collective Rule[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]Speeds the training of [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Settlers[ENDCOLOR] by 50% in the [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital and a free Settler appears near the [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital. Give 4 global happines and +1 culture from monuments.

Give +4 global happines and +1 culture from monuments.
